pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw: It looks like joint controllers currently cannot be set for nested models because the joint control widget creates a `joint_cmd` topic using a scoped model name while the joint controller expects a topic without a scoped name as you have pointed out. Changing the name affects the API, but since the topics are already inconsistent would it be ok as a bug fix?
content.html: It looks like joint controllers currently cannot be set for nested models because the joint control widget creates a joint_cmd topic using a scoped model name while the joint controller expects a topic without a scoped name as you have pointed out. Changing the name affects the API, but since the topics are already inconsistent would it be ok as a bug fix?
